meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Re and atomic number 75.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study rheniums to learn about elements.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes rheniums as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: When the rheniums threw a party, all the other elements wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: The importance of rheniums in chemistry is as significant as the sun in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The shiny rheniums sparkled under the laboratory lights.

meanings.sent1: The lab contained various rheniums for experimentation.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a vein of rheniums in the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The rheniums on the shelf seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The pile of rheniums resembled a treasure trove waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The market price of rheniums fluctuated throughout the year.
